e: ￹`Ma~`ta~`tahic~ `kita~ `a~ `mi~`tifek~.￺Let's the two of us use pestle and mill the grain.￻我們相互協助樁米
￹`Mi~`tahic~ `kako~ `i~ `ci~`ngraan~ `to~ `pi~`padang~ `nira~ `i~ `takowanan~.￺I want toget even with him for his helping me.￻因他曾幫助我，我要還他的工
d.f: ￹￺to get even in a positive way * pay back￻以積極的方法取得統一，還清，付清
